thread.title: BRIEF-Jazz Airport Services Employees Ratify Labour Agreement

title: BRIEF-Jazz Airport Services Employees Ratify Labour Agreement

organizations.name: brief-jazz airport services employees ratify labour agreement reuters
brief-jazz airport services employees ratify labour

text:
11 AM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Jazz Airport Services Employees Ratify Labour Agreement Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Chorus Aviation Inc: * JAZZ AIRPORT SERVICES EMPLOYEES RATIFY LABOUR AGREEMENT 
* ‍UNIT JAZZ AVIATION RATIFIED A TENTATIVE AGREEMENT, REACHED ON JANUARY 9, 2018, WITH ITS JAZZ AIRPORT SERVICES GROUP​ 
* SAYS NEW COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT EXTENDS TO JANUARY 13, 2022 AND INCLUDES AGREEMENT ON WAGES, PENSION AND BENEFITS
